Sentencas: These conditions have limited in-situ missions to high altitude balloons at 55 km that survived only 48 h. High-altitude balloon missions are stymied by the opaqueness of the Venusian clouds and constant altitude.
Titulo: Extended-range Variable Altitude Balloons for Venus atmospheric missions

Sentencas: Long-duration, extended range variable-altitude balloons covering below the clouds could enhance the science capabilities of the missions by measuring chemical species, isotopes and atmospheric flow patterns in and underneath the clouds.
Titulo: Extended-range Variable Altitude Balloons for Venus atmospheric missions

Sentencas: A new energy storage system tolerant to the high temperatures at low altitudes is needed to support such a balloon.
Titulo: Extended-range Variable Altitude Balloons for Venus atmospheric missions

Sentencas: A novel variable altitude balloon architecture with an extended range of 55???20 km (VAB-X) was developed under the NASA Innovative and Advanced Concepts (NIAC) program and is described here.
Titulo: Extended-range Variable Altitude Balloons for Venus atmospheric missions

Sentencas: The architecture comprises a high-temperature tolerant balloon and photovoltaic array for providing spacecraft power, a reversible solid oxide fuel (SOFC) for low-altitude power and fuel regeneration, and reversible metal hydride (MH) for hydrogen storage.
Titulo: Extended-range Variable Altitude Balloons for Venus atmospheric missions

Sentencas: Hydrogen is used for the buoyancy and altitude control of the zero-pressure balloon and as fuel for SOFC.
Titulo: Extended-range Variable Altitude Balloons for Venus atmospheric missions

Sentencas: Water brought from Earth can replenish the hydrogen lost to leaks during the mission.
Titulo: Extended-range Variable Altitude Balloons for Venus atmospheric missions

Sentencas: Preliminary analyses reveal the efficacy of the architecture for long-term Venus exploration over 55-20 km altitude, with a high proportion (-20%) of the total suspended mass (>20 kg) available for science payload.
Titulo: Extended-range Variable Altitude Balloons for Venus atmospheric missions
